name: POSITIVE (SamurIDev)
description:
Can you stay POSITIVE through the alien invasion? See how far you can get!

INSTRUCTIONS:

WASD to move, Mouse to aim and shoot and SPACE to show the highscore. Make sure you keep your skill points balanced, or else.. weird things will start happening.

As your negative balance increases, "Glitches" will start happening. The higher the Negative balance, the more severe the Glitches. try to keep your skill points the same as you fight through waves of aliens and giant bosses! Shoot the points to collect them and gain Health, Gun Level, and Speed Level!

BOSSES SPAWN AT:

-60 Score

-120 Score

-180 Score

-300 Score

-After the final boss, it becomes endless.

GLITCHES INCLUDE:

Paralysis - You can't move.

Blinded - You can't see.

Jammed - You can't shoot.

Enemies - A wave of enemies spawns.
